org.apache.flink.configuration

类 TaskManagerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.TaskManagerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class TaskManagerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to TaskManager and Task settings.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> EXIT_ON_FATAL_AKKA_ERROR
      Whether the quarantine monitor for task managers shall be started.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> KILL_ON_OUT_OF_MEMORY
      Whether to kill the TaskManager when the task thread throws an OutOfMemoryError
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> MANAGED_MEMORY_FRACTION
      Fraction of free memory allocated by the memory manager if MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE is not set.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> MANAGED_MEMORY_PRE_ALLOCATE
      Whether TaskManager managed memory should be pre-allocated when the TaskManager is starting.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE
      Amount of memory to be allocated by the task manager's memory manager (in megabytes).
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> MEMORY_OFF_HEAP
      Memory allocation method (JVM heap or off-heap), used for managed memory of the TaskManager as well as the network buffers.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MEMORY_SEGMENT_SIZE
      Size of memory buffers used by the network stack and the memory manager (in bytes).
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION
      Fraction of JVM memory to use for network buffers.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX
      Maximum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN
      Minimum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_BUFFERS_PER_CHANNEL
      Number of network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming channel (subpartition/input channel).
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> NETWORK_DETAILED_METRICS
      Boolean flag to enable/disable more detailed metrics about inbound/outbound network queue lengths.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_EXTRA_BUFFERS_PER_GATE
      Number of extra network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming gate (result partition/input gate).
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_NUM_BUFFERS
      已过时。 
      use NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION, NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN, and NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX instead
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_INITIAL
      Minimum backoff for partition requests of input channels.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_MAX
      Maximum backoff for partition requests of input channels.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RPC_PORT
      The default network port range the task manager expects incoming IPC connections.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CANCELLATION_INTERVAL
      Time interval in milliseconds between two successive task cancellation attempts.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CANCELLATION_TIMEOUT
      Timeout in milliseconds after which a task cancellation times out and leads to a fatal TaskManager error.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CHECKPOINT_ALIGNMENT_BYTES_LIMIT
      The maximum number of bytes that a checkpoint alignment may buffer.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> TASK_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY
      JVM heap size (in megabytes) for the TaskManagers

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private TaskManagerOptions()
      Not intended to be instantiated

    • 方法概要

    • 字段详细资料

      • TASK_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> TASK_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY
        JVM heap size (in megabytes) for the TaskManagers

      • KILL_ON_OUT_OF_MEMORY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> KILL_ON_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        Whether to kill the TaskManager when the task thread throws an OutOfMemoryError

      • EXIT_ON_FATAL_AKKA_ERROR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> EXIT_ON_FATAL_AKKA_ERROR
        Whether the quarantine monitor for task managers shall be started. The quarantine monitor shuts down the actor system if it detects that it has quarantined another actor system or if it has been quarantined by another actor system.

      • RPC_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RPC_PORT
        The default network port range the task manager expects incoming IPC connections. The "0" means that the TaskManager searches for a free port.

      • MEMORY_SEGMENT_SIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MEMORY_SEGMENT_SIZE
        Size of memory buffers used by the network stack and the memory manager (in bytes).

      • MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE
        Amount of memory to be allocated by the task manager's memory manager (in megabytes). If not set, a relative fraction will be allocated, as defined by MANAGED_MEMORY_FRACTION.

      • MANAGED_MEMORY_FRACTION

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> MANAGED_MEMORY_FRACTION
        Fraction of free memory allocated by the memory manager if MANAGED_MEMORY_SIZE is not set.

      • MEMORY_OFF_HEAP

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> MEMORY_OFF_HEAP
        Memory allocation method (JVM heap or off-heap), used for managed memory of the TaskManager as well as the network buffers.

      • MANAGED_MEMORY_PRE_ALLOCATE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> MANAGED_MEMORY_PRE_ALLOCATE
        Whether TaskManager managed memory should be pre-allocated when the TaskManager is starting.

      • NETWORK_NUM_BUFFERS

        @Deprecated
public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_NUM_BUFFERS
        已过时。 use NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION, NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN, and NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX instead
        Number of buffers used in the network stack. This defines the number of possible tasks and shuffles.

      • NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Float> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_FRACTION
        Fraction of JVM memory to use for network buffers.

      • NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MIN
        Minimum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)

      • NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> NETWORK_BUFFERS_MEMORY_MAX
        Maximum memory size for network buffers (in bytes)

      • NETWORK_BUFFERS_PER_CHANNEL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_BUFFERS_PER_CHANNEL
        Number of network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming channel (subpartition/input channel). Reasoning: 1 buffer for in-flight data in the subpartition + 1 buffer for parallel serialization

      • NETWORK_EXTRA_BUFFERS_PER_GATE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_EXTRA_BUFFERS_PER_GATE
        Number of extra network buffers to use for each outgoing/incoming gate (result partition/input gate).

      • NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_INITIAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_INITIAL
        Minimum backoff for partition requests of input channels.

      • NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_MAX

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> NETWORK_REQUEST_BACKOFF_MAX
        Maximum backoff for partition requests of input channels.

      • NETWORK_DETAILED_METRICS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> NETWORK_DETAILED_METRICS
        Boolean flag to enable/disable more detailed metrics about inbound/outbound network queue lengths.

      • TASK_CANCELLATION_INTERVAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CANCELLATION_INTERVAL
        Time interval in milliseconds between two successive task cancellation attempts.

      • TASK_CANCELLATION_TIMEOUT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CANCELLATION_TIMEOUT
        Timeout in milliseconds after which a task cancellation times out and leads to a fatal TaskManager error. A value of 0 deactivates the watch dog.

      • TASK_CHECKPOINT_ALIGNMENT_BYTES_LIMIT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> TASK_CHECKPOINT_ALIGNMENT_BYTES_LIMIT
        The maximum number of bytes that a checkpoint alignment may buffer. If the checkpoint alignment buffers more than the configured amount of data, the checkpoint is aborted (skipped).

        The default value of -1 indicates that there is no limit.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TaskManagerOptions

        private TaskManagerOptions()
        Not intended to be instantiated
